Costa Mesa

Meet The Team

Mark Moon

I came from S. Korea in 2007 and started my career as an tax accountant in Two Miles from 2009. I graduated from Yonsei University's Graduate School of International Studies (Finance-focused)

What is your favorite quote?

Don't keep until tomorrow what you can do today

Why are you working at Two Miles?

Two Miles are flexible in many respects and allows me to keep a balance between work and family. Also, clients in various industries encourage me to learn what customers really wants on their daily business accounting. Furthermore, the atmosphere in the office is like Google (Although I have never been with it). There is no hierarchy but nice co-workers who collaborate each other in Two Miles.

What do you like to do outside of work?

I enjoy having a quality time with my family – visiting near-by parks and watching kids having fun.

What is your future goal?

Having a CPA license and a Master in Business Taxation degree are my current priority in the short term.

Junko Lee

I graduated from college in Nagoya, Japan, In 2003, my husband and I moved to Los Angeles. After graduating from Cal State Long Beach in December 2009, I started as an intern for Two Miles and have been here ever since.

What is your favorite quote?

"Do not forget that the people who dug the well" -My Father

Why are you working at Two Miles?

I love the atmosphere and that I am constantly learning at Two Miles.

What do you like to do outside of work?

I like to read a book or perform yoga at home. I also like to walk, eat and travel.

What is your future goal?

To be able to acquire and improve my professional knowledge in the field of accounting.

Matt Naito

I'm mainly in charge of payroll service in Two Miles. I developed a database of a very complicated schedule management by myself to provide a better service to the clients. And I keep in mind to serve for all staffs to be able to bring them the best performance and for increase both sales and profits of Two Miles as a servant leader.

What is your favorite Bible verses?

Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight. (Proverbs 3:5-6) Surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age. (Matthew 28:20)

Why are you working at Two Miles?

Because I have the same purpose and foundation of the life as Hiro and I can share them through Two Miles and all is the best environment to give everything which I cultivated so far as my compilation.

What do you like to do outside of work?

I like to drive by a convertible car while listening my favorite music, and to watch the American football game, especially, Huntington Beach High School Oilers and USC Trojans, and to enjoy the fellowship with Christians.

What is your future goal?

To establish the eternal heritage. To serve by my talent to people all over the world. To become the sample person who has been able to change from despair to hope, from uneasiness to courage.

What is your strength?

My strength is trust in God. I have so many wonderful experiences by having chosen to enter the narrow gate, not the wide gate. Finally, I love mankind.

Lilian Meza

Office Manager, Cal State Fullerton, Business Administration, Accounting

Be good to others and help them whenever you can.

"There is only one person who could ever make you happy, and that person is you"

Why are you working at Two Miles?

It is a company that gives you the opportunity to grow as an individual and a professional.

What do you like to do outside of work?

Life is a precious gift from God, so I enjoy spending time with family and friends as much as I can, travel for vacation. I love crafting stuff and do some.

What is your future goal?

Pursuing Leadership.

Elena Meza

Admin Assistant

Elena is from Peru. She graduated from Universidad Nacional Agraria de la Selva, Tingo Maria- Peru with a degree in Business Administration. She has been working at Two Miles since August 2008 in an Administrative capacity. Working at Two Miles has helped her grow both spiritual and professionally.

What is your favorite quote?

If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.

Why are you working at Two Miles?

Two Miles is not only my workplace. It is my school.

What do you like to do outside of work?

Organize my house, walk by the beach and park.

What is your future goal?

Learn as much as I can until I eventually take on a leadership role.

What are your strengths?

Patience, dedication, enthusiasm and ability to multitask.

Christina Lee

Christina joined two Miles after graduating from the University of San Diego with of San Diego with a bachelor’s degree in Accountancy.

What is your favorite quote?

“We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.” -John Rohn

Why are you working at Two Miles?

The collaborative environment and ability to work closely with clients across many industries.

What do you like to do outside of work?

I enjoy reading and spending time with my family.

What is your future goal?

A short term goal is attaining a CPA license.

What is your strength?

Diligence, analyzing problems and implementing solutions.

Ester Wen

Intern at Two Miles, Master’s in Professional Accountancy, CPA Candidate

Received two bachelor’s degrees in computer information system from Campbellsville University in Kentucky, computer science from Yanbian University of Science and Technology in China. Currently pursuing a master’s degree in professional accountancy at Biola University, California and interning at Two Miles.

What is your favorite quote?

Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see (Hebrews 11:1).

Why are you working at Two Miles?

I became interested in tax research after I started working at Two Miles. I like the varieties of experiences that I am exposed to here, and the working environment including my co-workers and flexibility of work.

What do you like to do outside of work?

I like to work-out and visiting museums on the weekends.

What is your future goal?

I want to be a professional tax consultant in both individuals and corporate tax planning.

What is your strength?

I am efficient, hard-working, and like to search for solutions for complex issues.

Hisato Takahashi

Hisato earned his B.S. degree in business from the Meiji University in Japan. After graduated, he worked at government in Tokyo. Three years later, he came to U.S. to continue education in University of California, Irvine. Then, he started his accounting career and joined Two Miles in 2019.

What is your favorite quote?

He who moves not forward, goes backward.

Why are you working at Two Miles?

I can learn what is needed for accounting firms in the next step.

What do you like to do outside of work?

Kendo

What is your future goal?

I want to support people who start new business from accounting side.

What is your strength?

Diligent

Eiichi Kanayama

Through the study abroad While attending University in Tokyo, strongly influenced by America. Involved in the duties and management of overseas sales for manufacturing, Restaurant industry, Real estate, Marketing & Promotion business etc., and fully realized the importance of numbers structured for businesses and financials, and became Tax and accounting professional. Based on the experience in sales positions, highly skilled and capable for negotiation, engaged in the establishment of various Engagement, Planning and Pricing.

What is your favorite quote?

The people and circumstance around you are shadows you created, and Life isn’t worth living, unless it is lived for someone else.

What do you like to do outside of work?

Surfing, Workout, Spending time with Family & My people at the beach.

What is your future goal?

Support various people and company beyond the framework of tax & accounting, and provide prestigious consulting and advisory works globally.

Shingo Fujimura

Originally from Japan. Shingo graduated from Tokushima University and worked for Daikin-Sauer-Danfoss Technical Support Division as a Mechanical Engineer. Suddenly found his mission is to be a professional accountant to support business in US. Came to US, got an accounting degree & CPA at the age of 30, continued accounting carrier 7 years, and joined Two Miles in 2019.

What is your favorite quote?

I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying. ― Michael Jordan.

Why are you working at Two Miles?

To make the new standard of sample accounting company in the world.

What do you like to do outside of work?

Swim, Bike, and Run.

What is your future goal?

To create the world anyone can make the right decision using accounting tools and knowledge

What are your Strengths?

Performance improvement of your business. Accepting new technology and implementing workflow structure into your business.

About Two Miles

We are committed to offer a variety of solutions with a reasonable price. We focus on your business goals and to assist your success with passion. Our desire is to become your partners in reaching you business and personal goals.
